mapper.insert: insert into administrator( admin_id, admin_pw, admin_name, admin_contact, admin_address, admin_gender, admin_email) values( #{admin_id}, #{admin_pw}, #{admin_name}, #{admin_contact}, #{admin_address}, #{admin_gender}, #{admin_email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from administrator where admin_name like concat('%', #{searchValue}, '%')
